data.title: The most relaxing 2 hours of my life!
data.text: When visiting family in Shady Cove, I was looking for some "Mommy Time" while my dad and stepmom watched my 3-year-old son.  I googled the Medford area and came across some nice reviews of the spa.  The best part was the same-day online booking (only 2 hours advance notice!)  If you are able to, I highly recommend Charmaine Carnes.  She was so sweet, professional, knowledgeable and highly skilled.  I had a signature deluxe facial and a soothing foot treatment...both SOOOOOO nice!  I didn't want to leave the spa...lol!  It was very clean, tastefully decorated and all products smelled wonderful.  An adorable British couple owns the spa and they were so friendly; they even served English Tea and cookies!  If you're looking for a relaxing time away for a few hours, definitely come to the European Touch Day Spa in Medford!  :)

data.title: Great spa  experience
data.text: My wife and I enjoy traveling to new places, and we were delighted to find the European Touch day spa in Medford, Oregon.  From the moment we walked into the spa we felt relaxed and welcomed - very important to us!  The ambiance is beautiful and unique, the rooms have nice touches of London, Rome, Prague,etc. We found out the owners have extensive training from the UK. The service is top notch...highly recommended!!!

data.title: Best spa in the valley
data.text: The people at The European Touch really know what they are doing. It's a nice place with a sauna, but the practitioners are really the best. The Owner Michelle is most welcoming and they have COOKIES! That seals the deal for me. Want a great facial or massage? Stop in here whether your a local or just passing through.

data.title: Amazing Experience
data.text: The moment you walk in the door you are greeted with a warm and friendly hello.  I have had a number of treatments from singe and couple massages to facials.  Each time has been wonderful.  The staff are very professional and are experts at their service.  The Spa has wonderful theme rooms and I go and just escape.  I have purchased many gift certificates for many friends and family.  It is a wonderful gift and a fabulous way to relax and revitalize yourself.  Thank you all of you for a delightful local escape.

data.title: A wonderful spa experience
data.text: 5 stars isn't enough to describe the experience you will have here. Courteous greetings, extremely clean, calm atmosphere, very professional, cozy setting, and I could go on! I have received a variety of facial packages, and every one of them has been yummy, very relaxing, and thorough.Treat yourself and try them all.

data.title: Wonderful spa in Medford, Oregon
data.text:
Coming from Belgium and travelling from the Bay Area to Portland I discovered this terrific day spa in little town Medford, Oregon.
What a pleasant surprise it was; the service was absolutely fantastic with friendly therapists and their excellent techniques. Highly recommended. 
N'hésitez-pas à vous y rendre!
